seo.metaDescription: Leading class action law firm specializing in privacy, consumer protection, and insurance litigation.
seo.metaKeywords: class action, privacy law, consumer protection, insurance litigation, legal services

servicesOrange.subtitle: OUR SERVICES
servicesOrange.title: WE ARE CLASS ACTION
servicesOrange.description: Our team specializes in complex class action litigation, fighting for consumer rights and privacy protection. We bring decades of experience and a proven track record of success.
servicesOrange.privacyDescription: Protecting your digital rights in the modern age.

cards.title: Privacy Class Action
cards.description: We protect consumers from unauthorized data collection, breaches, and privacy violations by major corporations.

cards.title: Consumer Protection
cards.description: Fighting against deceptive business practices, false advertising, and unfair consumer treatment.

cards.title: Insurance Class Action
cards.description: Holding insurance companies accountable for bad faith practices and wrongful claim denials.

cases.title: Data Breach Settlement
cases.description: Successfully represented consumers in a major data breach affecting millions of users.

cases.title: Insurance Bad Faith
cases.description: Won significant settlement for policyholders denied legitimate claims.

cases.title: Consumer Fraud
cases.description: Recovered damages for consumers affected by deceptive pricing practices.
